editions.title: Total value of UK exports
editions.summary: Estimated total value of UK exports including trade in both goods and services (experimental statistics), UK, 2021.
editions.description:
This dataset shows the estimated total value of UK exports including trade in both goods and services (experimental statistics), in the UK, for 2021.

### Coverage 

UK 

#### Geography definition

International Territorial Level (ITL) 1, 2 and 3,
City Regions,
Country (UK)

### Source

 - UK: [Office for National Statistics](https://www.ons.gov.uk/businessindustryandtrade/internationaltrade/bulletins/internationaltradeinuknationsregionsandcities/previousReleases)
editions.creator: ofcom
